title: Bacolor Crater
description: Bacolor Crater is a magnificent impact feature about 20 kilometers (12 miles) wide. The lines on the ejecta blanket surrounding the crater rim come from a surge of superheated gas and debris flying outward in the wake of the meteorite impact that made the crater.
theme:
MARS. The Red Planet, one of the most desirable
destinations for humanity
